xccdf:Benchmark.xccdf:title: XCCDF Benchmark That References the Validation Content for the group_test
xccdf:Benchmark.xccdf:description: This XCCDF Benchmark references the OVAL Definitions in the validation content for the group_test.

xccdf:metadata.dc:contributor: National Institute of Standards and Technology
xccdf:metadata.dc:publisher: National Institute of Standards and Technology

xccdf:Profile.xccdf:title: XCCDF Profile That References the Validation Content for the group_test
xccdf:Profile.xccdf:description: This Profile allows for the tailoring of the validation content for the group_test.

metadata.title: Test the group entity with the equals operation
metadata.description: Make sure the group entity properly supports the equals operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the group equals TESTMACHINE\testgroup.

metadata.title: Test the group entity with the not equal operation
metadata.description: Make sure the group entity properly supports the not equal operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the group is not equal to TESTMACHINE\TEstgroup.

metadata.title: Test the group entity with the case insensitive equals operation
metadata.description: Make sure the group entity properly supports the case insensitive equals operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the group case insensitive equals TESTMACHINE\TEstgroup.

metadata.title: Test the group entity with the case insensitive not equal operation
metadata.description: Make sure the group entity properly supports the case insensitive not equal operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the group is case insensitive not equal to TESTMACHINE\NOSUCHGROUP.

metadata.title: Test the group entity with the pattern match operation
metadata.description: Make sure the group entity properly supports the pattern match operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the group matches the regular expression ^.*$.

metadata.title: Test the group entity with the equals operation
metadata.description: Make sure the group entity properly supports the equals operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the group equals TESTMACHINE\TEstgroup.

metadata.title: Test the group entity with the not equal operation
metadata.description: Make sure the group entity properly supports the not equal operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the group is not equal to TESTMACHINE\testgroup.

metadata.title: Test the group entity with the case insensitive equals operation
metadata.description: Make sure the group entity properly supports the case insensitive equals operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the group case insensitive equals TESTMACHINE\NOSUCHGROUP.

metadata.title: Test the group entity with the case insensitive not equal operation
metadata.description: Make sure the group entity properly supports the case insensitive not equal operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the group is case insensitive not equal to TESTMACHINE\TEstgroup.

metadata.title: Test the group entity with the pattern match operation
metadata.description: Make sure the group entity properly supports the pattern match operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the group matches the regular expression ^[^\w].*$.

metadata.title: Test the user entity with the equals operation
metadata.description: Make sure the user entity properly supports the equals operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the user equals TESTMACHINExx\testuser.

metadata.title: Test the user entity with the not equal operation
metadata.description: Make sure the user entity properly supports the not equal operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the user is not equal to TESTMACHINExx\testuser2.

metadata.title: Test the user entity with the case insensitive equals operation
metadata.description: Make sure the user entity properly supports the case insensitive equals operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the user case insensitive equals TESTMACHINExx\testUSER.

metadata.title: Test the user entity with the case insensitive not equal operation
metadata.description: Make sure the user entity properly supports the case insensitive not equal operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the user is case insensitive not equal to TESTMACHINExx\testUSER2.

metadata.title: Test the user entity with the pattern match operation
metadata.description: Make sure the user entity properly supports the pattern match operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the user matches the regular expression ^.+est[Uu]ser$

metadata.title: Test the subgroup entity with the equals operation
metadata.description: Make sure the subgroup entity properly supports the equals operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the subgroup equals TESTMACHINExx\testsub1.

metadata.title: Test the subgroup entity with the not equal operation
metadata.description: Make sure the subgroup entity properly supports the not equal operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the subgroup is not equal to TESTMACHINExx\testsub2.

metadata.title: Test the subgroup entity with the case insensitive equals operation
metadata.description: Make sure the subgroup entity properly supports the case insensitive equals operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the subgroup case insensitive equals TESTMACHINExx\TESTsub1.

metadata.title: Test the subgroup entity with the case insensitive not equal operation
metadata.description: Make sure the subgroup entity properly supports the case insensitive not equal operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the subgroup is case insensitive not equal to TESTMACHINExx\TESTsub2.

metadata.title: Test the subgroup entity with the pattern match operation
metadata.description: Make sure the subgroup entity properly supports the pattern match operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the subgroup matches the regular expression ^.*1$
